name: Thunderstrike - Thor the Hammer
text:
1 Thunder type Tuner monster + 1 or more Thunder type non-Tuner monster(s) 
 If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can send cards on the field to the GY, up to the number of monsters used for the Synchro Summon of this card. (Quick Effect): You can banish up to 3 Thunder monsters in your hand or face-up on the field and target face-up cards on the field equal to the number banished; halve the attack of those monsters, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK for each card affected. You can only activate each effect of "Thunderstrike - Thor the Hammer" once per turn.
